about_the_game:
Welcome to Boardgame Society!


Step into the thrilling and unpredictable world of Boardgame Society, where classic board game nights meet eerie supernatural phenomena. But beware – in this unique gathering, the game boards have a mind of their own. Cursed with a mischievous spirit, they refuse to stay in one place, constantly shifting and reshuffling, adding an extra layer of challenge and excitement to your gaming experience.

We're delighted to welcome you to our society! As you settle in, we hope you’ve come prepared with plenty of snacks, because you're in for an unforgettable ride. Boardgame Society offers a delightful blend of nostalgic 80s horror tropes with a contemporary twist, creating a distinctive atmosphere that is both spooky and exhilarating.

A New Twist on Classic Board Games


Imagine the thrill of playing your favorite board games with friends, but with a modern twist: you can experience all the fun and camaraderie without the need to gather in person. This is the essence of Boardgame Society – a virtual space where you can connect, compete, and collaborate with friends from afar, all while being immersed in a creepy, yet charming, horror-themed environment.

The ambiance is inspired by the iconic horror films of the 1980s, complete with flickering lights, mysterious shadows, and eerie soundtracks. Yet, it’s brought into the present day with seamless online connectivity, allowing you to share the excitement and suspense with friends across the globe. The cursed boards add an element of unpredictability, ensuring that no two game nights are ever the same.

Join the Fun


So, are you ready to dive into this fantastical fusion of horror and board game nostalgia? Grab your snacks, gather your courage, and prepare to embark on a unique adventure with Boardgame Society. Whether you're strategizing in a haunted mansion, escaping from supernatural forces, or simply trying to keep the game board from disappearing under your nose, every session promises a mix of laughter, suspense, and a touch of the supernatural.

Welcome once again to Boardgame Society. We're thrilled to have you with us, and we can't wait to see how you navigate the spooky, ever-changing world of cursed board games. Ready to roll the dice? Let the games begin!

Game features:
  • Multiplayer PVP
  • Multiplayer PVE
  • Boardgame aesthetics
  • Crossplay (IOS/Android/PC)
  • Horror satirical elements
  • Turn-based gameplay
  • Original music
  • Custom cards and boardgame
  • Skin customization
  • Tabletop vibes
  • Multiple levels
  • Dynamic optimization of game
  • P2P hosting solution
  • Multiple Events
  • In-game tutorial

short_description: Take on an ever-changing tile-based board with up to 6 players, and see just how much treasure you can scavenge before the big bad boss is defeated! Beware though, your friends might want some of that treasure for themselves.
